org.biojava.utils.io

Class LargeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.utils.io.LargeBuffer

  • public class LargeBuffer
extends Object
    Wrapper arround MappedByteBuffers to allow long-indexed access to files larger than 2 gigs.
    Author:
    Matthews Pocock

    • Constructor Summary
